name: cream
description: C.R.E.A.M. - Confidential Reliable Ethereum Anonymous Mixer

scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run compile && npm run migrate
scripts.exit: lsof -i :8545 | grep node | grep -v grep | awk '{ print "kill -9", $2 }' | sh
scripts.test:workflow: ganache-cli & npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run test && npm run exit

author: Kazuaki Ishiguro <kazuaki@couger.co.jp>
